Zephyra:
Alchemy can only study arte, toured the world Wind Spirits.
So just to master this art does not - need to train long and hard. To begin the study of alchemy, you must spend at least 1 Releasing.
Each artist should be able to combine objects using Rollikuba, as well as transform them, thereby increasing their value. There are some nuances, but you will learn about them later. Haha!
